title: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 14 Highlights Ghosts of the Past
description: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 14 explored Will and Rafael's relationship as they grieved Rafael's grandma. Check out our review. The post Will Trent Season 3 Episode 14 Highlights Ghosts of the Past appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: One Tree Hill Was a Defining Teen Drama, but I Don’t Think the Reboot Can Succeed in Today’s World
description: One Tree Hill defined a generation, but that was decades ago. Can the reboot deliver relevant stories to a new generation?   The post One Tree Hill Was a Defining Teen Drama, but I Don’t Think the Reboot Can Succeed in Today’s World appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Joshua Pleming

title: Based on a True Story Among Two Shows Cancelled at Peacock
description: Peacock has closed the book on Based on a True Story, cancelling the true crime satire after two seasons, TVLine has confirmed. The streamer has also cancelled the sports comedy Mr. Throwback, starring Adam Pally and Stephen Curry, after one season. (Our sister site Variety first reported the news.) The news comes five months after […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Will Trent Shocker: EPs Tee Up ‘Really Emotional, Really Scary’ Ormewood Storyline
description: Will Trent finally revealed what Rafael Wexford has been holding over Will’s head all season — but if you made your way over to TVLine immediately following Tuesday’s episode, chances are you want answers regarding the fate of Jake McLaughlin’s Detective Michael Ormewood. In Season 3, Episode 14, Ormewood learned that he has a brain […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
